page.description: Gets a pointer to an individual control in a List row, allowing you to manipulate its properties using Javascript.

argument.name: UXListName
argument.description: The name of the List control.

argument.name: field
argument.description: The field name of the element, as defined in the *[ui:Fields]* pane of the List Builder.

argument.name: elementType
argument.description: The type of element. It can be one of the following values:

argument.name: rowNumber
argument.description: A zero based List row number (ie, the first row in the List has a row number of 0.)
